title: Penalty
context: [§571-57] Penalty. The penalty for the offense of making a false statement under &ldquo;penalty of perjury&rdquo; shall be the same as would apply if the false statement had been made under oath or affirmation required or authorized by law. [L 1970, c 17, pt of §1] Cross References Perjury and related offenses, see §§710-1060 to 1068.
